channel.title: Path Problems
channel.description: When people download my client some of them get the PATH error but they all got different paths to jdk/jre or whatever they got to make the server run. Any way to make it work for everyone without going on their teamview and changing their path?

item.title: Path Problems
item.dc:creator: @noobface1234 noobface1234
item.description:
@noobface1234 wrote:

When people download my client some of them get the PATH error but they all got different paths to jdk/jre or whatever they got to make the server run. Any way to make it work for everyone without going on their teamview and changing their path?

Read full topic
